content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-4.5, 24.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 24.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
- Steam engine at position(-0.5, -9.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(40.5, -82.5)
Consists of the following entity:
- Burner mining drill at position(40.5, -82.5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position(5.0, 5.0)

### Lab at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Lab at position(0.0, 0.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to harvest resources
- Ensure you are within reach of the resource you want to harvest before attempting to harvest it.

### Errors when connecting entities to power
- Make sure to have enough small electric poles in your inventory to connect your entities to the power network.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it there.
